mapper.select: select distinct o.p_bno, p.p_name from tbl_order_list l join tbl_order_product o on l.l_lno = o.l_lno join tbl_product_info i on o.p_ino = i.p_ino join tbl_product p on i.pno = p.pno where l.l_lno = #{l_lno} and deletestate = 1
select * from tbl_order_product p join tbl_product_info i on p.p_ino = i.p_ino join tbl_pointshop_board b on p.p_bno = b.p_bno where p.p_bno = #{p_bno} and deletestate = 1 order by o_pno
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_product (o_pno, l_lno, p_ino, p_bno, o_amount, o_sum, o_titlepic, o_price, o_deliverycharge) values (#{o_pno}, #{l_lno}, #{p_ino}, #{p_bno}, #{o_amount}, #{o_sum}, #{o_titlepic}, #{o_price}, #{o_deliverycharge})
